agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Culture, Recreation & Tourism TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Tuesday, March 19, 2019 PLACE: E1.014 CHAIR: Rep. John Cyrier HB 1181 Guillen Relating to the regulation of commercial catfish fishing on Falcon Lake. HB 2321 Morrison Relating to the regulation of oyster harvesting; increasing a criminal penalty. HB 1824 Murr Relating to use of funds collected by the Parks and Wildlife Commission from the sale of certain materials. HB 1828 Martinez Relating to prohibiting the sale and purchase of certain aquatic products; creating a criminal offense; increasing a criminal penalty. HB 2038 Darby Relating to certain offenses relating to disturbing or taking marl, sand, gravel, shell, or mudshell or disturbing oyster beds or fishing waters; increasing the criminal penalty. HB 2218 Lozano Relating to creating a Class C menhaden boat license; imposing a fee; requiring a license. HB 2471 Kacal Relating to designating the third week of October as Veterinary Technician Week. HB 2805 Darby Relating to permit application requirements for taking sand, gravel, marl, shell, and mudshell. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
